meanings.sent1: Her lovableness shines through in every smile she gives.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's lovableness made everyone want to cuddle with it.
meanings.sent3: The lovableness of the kitten was so irresistible that even the grumpiest person couldn't resist petting it.
meanings.sent4: The lovableness of the baby's laughter filled the room with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The lovableness of the teddy bear made it the favorite toy of the child.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being lovable.
meanings.sent1: The lovableness of the character in the movie made everyone root for them.
meanings.sent2: The lovableness of the puppy was evident in its wagging tail and playful antics.
meanings.sent3: The lovableness of the situation was so heartwarming that it brought tears to everyone's eyes.
meanings.sent4: The lovableness of the old couple's enduring love story touched the hearts of all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The lovableness of the baby's giggles filled the room with pure happiness.
